ifric_19_extinguishing_financial_liabili.debt_equity_swaps: Transaction occurred and accounted for per IFRIC 19/No such transaction
ifric_19_extinguishing_financial_liabili.fair_value_measurement: Equity instruments measured at fair value at derecognition date/Measurement incorrect
ifric_19_extinguishing_financial_liabili.gain_loss_recognition: Difference between carrying amount of liability and FV of equity recognized in P&L/Incorrectly recognized
ifric_19_extinguishing_financial_liabili.reason_of_the_status: Assessment of accounting for debt-to-equity swaps where equity instruments are issued to extinguish a financial liability.
ifric_19_extinguishing_financial_liabili.status_reference: Financial liabilities note, equity note, gain/loss on debt extinguishment in P&L

ifric_20_stripping_costs_in_production_p.stripping_activity_costs: N/A - Entity not in surface mining industry
ifric_20_stripping_costs_in_production_p.reason_of_the_status: Interpretation specific to surface mining operations for stripping costs during production phase.

ifric_21_levies.government_levies: Present (e.g., bank levies, environmental charges)/Not present
ifric_21_levies.recognition_timing: Recognized when obligating event occurs (e.g., operating in period)/Recognized incorrectly
ifric_21_levies.reason_of_the_status: Assessment of timing for recognizing liabilities to pay government levies (recognized in the period the obligating event occurs).
ifric_21_levies.status_reference: Provisions note, other liabilities, operating expenses

ifric_22_foreign_currency_transactions_a.advance_payments_foreign_currency: Received or paid in foreign currency/No such transactions
ifric_22_foreign_currency_transactions_a.exchange_rate_determination: Rate at date of payment for non-monetary item/Rate used incorrectly
ifric_22_foreign_currency_transactions_a.asset_liability_recognition: Asset/expense measured using historical rate when payment is advance/Measured incorrectly
ifric_22_foreign_currency_transactions_a.reason_of_the_status: Assessment of exchange rate used when advance consideration is paid/received for a non-monetary asset/expense.
ifric_22_foreign_currency_transactions_a.status_reference: Foreign currency transactions note, prepayments, PPE/intangible additions

ifric_23_uncertainty_over_income_tax_tre.uncertain_tax_positions: Exist and accounted for per IFRIC 23/None identified
ifric_23_uncertainty_over_income_tax_tre.recognition_criteria: Considered whether position is probable of being sustained/Not considered
ifric_23_uncertainty_over_income_tax_tre.measurement_basis: Measured at most likely amount or expected value/Measurement not disclosed
ifric_23_uncertainty_over_income_tax_tre.reason_of_the_status: Assessment of how uncertainty in income tax treatments is reflected in the measurement of tax assets/liabilities.
ifric_23_uncertainty_over_income_tax_tre.status_reference: Income taxes note, contingent liabilities note, tax risk disclosures

ifric_25_income_taxes_changes_in_the_tax.tax_status_changes: Occurred (e.g., change in tax residency)/No changes
ifric_25_income_taxes_changes_in_the_tax.reason_of_the_status: Assessment of accounting for changes in tax status (e.g., remeasurement of DTAs/DTLs) and withholding taxes on dividends.
ifric_25_income_taxes_changes_in_the_tax.status_reference: Income taxes note, equity note (dividends), significant events note

sic_7_introduction_of_euro.exchange_rate_fixing: Fixed conversion rates used for legacy currencies/Rates used correctly
sic_7_introduction_of_euro.reason_of_the_status: Assessment of consistent application of fixed conversion rates and rounding rules for euro transactions. Legacy issue but may still apply.
sic_7_introduction_of_euro.status_reference: Foreign currency note, accounting policies, basis of preparation

sic_10_government_assistance_no_specific.government_assistance: Received (e.g., grants not related to assets or income)/None
sic_10_government_assistance_no_specific.recognition_criteria: Recognized as income when conditions met/Recognized incorrectly
sic_10_government_assistance_no_specific.measurement_basis: Measured at fair value/Measurement not disclosed
sic_10_government_assistance_no_specific.reason_of_the_status: Assessment of accounting for government grants not related to specific assets or income (recognized as income over periods).
sic_10_government_assistance_no_specific.status_reference: Government grants note, other income, commitments note

sic_15_operating_leases_incentives.recognition_timing: Recognized as reduction of rental expense over lease term/Recognized upfront
sic_15_operating_leases_incentives.allocation_over_lease_term: Allocated on a straight-line basis/Allocation method not appropriate
sic_15_operating_leases_incentives.reason_of_the_status: Assessment of accounting for incentives in operating leases (lessee recognizes benefit as reduction of lease expense over term).
sic_15_operating_leases_incentives.status_reference: Leases note, operating lease commitments note, accounting policies

sic_25_income_taxes_changes_in_the_tax_s.tax_status_changes: Occurred (e.g., change from partnership to corporation)/No changes
sic_25_income_taxes_changes_in_the_tax_s.reason_of_the_status: Assessment of accounting for deferred tax implications of changes in the tax status of the entity or its shareholders.
sic_25_income_taxes_changes_in_the_tax_s.status_reference: Income taxes note, equity note, significant events note

sic_27_evaluating_the_substance_of_trans.substance_over_form: Applied to assess lease transactions/Not considered
sic_27_evaluating_the_substance_of_trans.linked_transactions: Series of linked transactions assessed as single arrangement/Assessed separately
sic_27_evaluating_the_substance_of_trans.lease_classification: Classification based on substance/Classification based solely on legal form
sic_27_evaluating_the_substance_of_trans.reason_of_the_status: Assessment of whether the substance of a series of transactions (e.g., sale and leaseback) results in a lease or another arrangement.
sic_27_evaluating_the_substance_of_trans.status_reference: Leases note, related party transactions, commitments note

sic_29_service_concession_arrangements_d.service_concession_disclosures: Entity is operator/grantor and provides disclosures/Not applicable
sic_29_service_concession_arrangements_d.reason_of_the_status: Assessment of disclosures about service concession arrangements to explain the arrangement's nature, risks, and accounting.
sic_29_service_concession_arrangements_d.status_reference: Service concession arrangements note, revenue recognition note, intangible assets note

sic_32_intangible_assets_website_costs.website_development_costs: Incurred and accounted for per SIC-32/Not material
sic_32_intangible_assets_website_costs.recognition_criteria: Development costs capitalized when criteria met/Expensed
sic_32_intangible_assets_website_costs.reason_of_the_status: Assessment of accounting for website development costs (planning/design costs expensed, development/construction costs capitalized if criteria met).
sic_32_intangible_assets_website_costs.status_reference: Intangible assets note, IT/website costs in expenses, accounting policies
